channel.title: Bottle basics on TMC - 9 Digital Tech Semester 1
channel.description: Recent content in Bottle basics on TMC - 9 Digital Tech Semester 1

item.title: 01 Hello, World!
item.description: Make a new file named hello.py and enter the following code: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 from bottle import route, run @route('/') def index(): return "Hello, world!" run(reloader=True, debug=True) To run your file, you should be able to press the play button in the top right of the window. Failing that, from the file explorer on the left, right click on your file and choose Open in Integrated Terminal.
